summary: Don't use the console. Use these spells
descriptionHtml:
These spells can help you in the game a little more. It comes with 4 new spells that you get at the beginning of the game. And it requires no magicka or no skill to cast. If you liked these spells and also tried my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75666?]Fun Spells[/url] then just use my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75667?]Cheat And Fun Spells[/url] since it has all of these spells and the Fun Spells as one mod. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1011/?]here[/url] And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/28895]Oblivion Cheat Spells[/url].

Cheat Health
Fortify and Restore Health on self for one day in the game.

Cheat Magica
Fortify and Restore Magicka on self for one day in the game.

Cheat Stamina
Fortify and Restore Stamina on self for one day in the game.

Cheat Skills
Fortify all skills and unlocks all skill perks on self for one day in the game.

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
